thread.title: Valla & Associates opens representative office in Milan, Italy
thread.title_full: Valla & Associates opens representative office in Milan, Italy - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Valla & Associates opens representative office in Milan, Italy
text:
Boutique business law firm Valla & Associates, Inc., P.C. announced today the opening of a Representative Office in the heart of Milan, Italy.
San Francisco, CA
Boutique business law firm Valla & Associates, Inc., P.C., announced today the opening of a Representative Office in the heart of Milan, Italy, effective October 1, 2015. Antonio Valla, Founder and President of the Firm, stated: "I am excited to announce the opening of our rep office in Milan. Beyond a return to the city of my birth, our new, stable presence there will allow us to be even closer to the over 100 Italian companies we support and represent in major US markets, and to be ever more receptive to their immediate needs." The office will be staffed on a rotating basis by the Firm's associate attorneys, and by Mr. Valla.
Milan Representative Office Contact Information:
Valla & Associates, Inc., P.C.
Via G. Leopardi 7
20123 Milano
Italy
Tel.: +39 02 46577920
E-mail: milano(at)vallalaw(dot)com
ABOUT THE FIRM: V&A provides high-quality, responsive legal services to its international business clientele from offices in San Francisco and New York. The Firm's lawyers and paralegals are fluent in English, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Farsi and Cantonese. For further information, contact Stefano Caccia, Marketing Director, at stefano(dot)caccia(at)vallalaw(dot)com.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12969160.htm
